text.section:
The Board shall:
Determine the size of the Commission.
Appoint the members of the Commission.
Ensure that the membership of the Commission reflects the diversity of the County's population.

section.section: The term of a member of the Commission is 4 years.
The terms of the members shall be staggered in a manner to be determined by the Board.
A person may not serve more than two consecutive terms.
The Commission shall select a chairperson and a vice chairperson to be the officers of the Commission.
The term of an officer of the Commission is 1 year.
A person may not serve as an officer of the Commission for more than two consecutive terms.

text.section: Each member of the Commission shall serve without compensation.
